traits.name: Needle Defense
entries: Each time a creature makes a melee attack against a needle lord, it takes 2 piercing damage. A creature can choose to make an attack with disadvantage to avoid this damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The nettle lord makes 2 raking vine attacks.

actions.name: Needle Volley
entries: The needle lord makes up to {@dice 1d6} needle attacks, but it cannot attack the same target more than twice during its turn.

actions.name: Raking Vine
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 11 piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. The needle lord has two raking vines, each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Needle
entries: Ranged atk +2 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 2 (1d4 damage) piercing damage.
